name: Project I
description:
Free Download short play time
Project I is an action adventure game that emphasizes sword action and parrying. Defeat your enemies and advance.

She is trapped in an unknown laboratory. In her hand is a sword.
She wakes up in the Chamber of Origins. She doesn't know why here, she doesn't know why she woke up.
When she was died, she returns to this space again. Who is she?


She is trapped in an unknown laboratory. In her hand is a sword.

Be strong.


Defeat the enemies and escape from the lab.
